TitleMailSBD: [IIG Vietnam] 90th TOPIK: Your Candidate ID Number and Test Room Information
ContentMailSBD1: IIG Vietnam would like to provide you with important information regarding your 90th TOPIK Test, including your CANDIDATE ID NUMBER, TEST ROOM, and other relevant details, which are as follows:
ContentMailSBD2: Please print out the Test Admission Form here, which contains your candidate ID number, and bring it with you to the test along with a valid identification document.
ContentMailSBD3: **We would like to remind you of the following:
ContentMailSBD4: The Test Admission Form must be printed in color on an A4 portrait layout.
ContentMailSBD5: Candidates must be present at the test room at least 30 minutes before the scheduled test time. After this time, candidates will not be permitted to enter the test room.
ContentMailSBD6: It is important to read the Guidelines for TOPIK Test Candidates here thoroughly before the test.
ContentMailSBD7: For more information on the Regulations and Instructions for candidates, please click here.
ContentMailSBD8: Please make sure to find the location of the test before the test date. You can find directions to the test site here.
ContentMailSBD9: If you require further assistance or have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us via email at info@iigvietnam.edu.vn or our hotline at 1900 636 929 (during office hours).
ContentMailSBD12: Please note that this is an automatic email and we kindly ask that you do not reply to this message.
